channel.title: Cool Stars 19
channel.description: The latest news of Cool Stars 19

item.title: It's a wrap
item.description: Thanks to all of you. Stay tuned for info on proceedings.

item.title: Cool Stars 20 shipping back to Boston
item.description: The Cool Stars 19 SOC is happy to announce that Cool Stars will return to its roots in Boston, MA for Cool Stars 20.

item.title: List of participants is created
item.description: We published a list of registered participants. This list will be regularly updated.

item.title: Early registration is open
item.description: Early registration is open. The early registration period will last until Fri 08 Apr 2016

item.title: Request for financial support
item.description: Registration will be open soon. Meanwhile, we are accepting requests for financial support. You can find the conditions and the form on the registration webpage.

item.title: The CS19 hackaton is announced
item.description: The CS 19 hackaton is officially announced and registration is now open to 50 first participants. Visit the hack day webpage for more information.

item.title: Call for oral and poster contribution
item.description: The call for oral and poster contribution is open. Details can be found on the dedicated contributions page.

item.title: Splinter sessions are selected
item.description: Splinters session have been selected. The list of splinters together with a schedule can be found on our splinters page.

item.title: Call for splinter sessions is closed
item.description: The call for splinter session proposals is officially closed.

item.title: Splinter session deadline extended one week
item.description: Splinter session deadline extended one week to October 23rd.

item.title: First announcement
item.description: First announcement and call for splinter session proposals.

item.title: Website launched and SOC announced
item.description: Website for Cool Stars 19 is officially launched and SOC announced.

item.title: Uppsala selected to host CS19
item.description: Uppsala is selected as host of Cool Stars 19 in 2016.
